Engineering Management  Managed Engineering teams throughout his career: -  
• WSP – At a senior level - reviews on OE projects, checking design content,  
managing Design review processes  etc. 
• BPI – he was the Technical Lead for all large Major Projects,  coordinating 
the Engineering input, managing civil / mechanical / Electrical and SCADA 
engineers to deliver whole EHV Substation projects, detailed drawings , and 
specification checks . 
• Atkins – oversaw all Offsho re engineering packages,  checking vendor 
specifications and commenting on the design packs . 
• McNicholas – he was the Project Engineering Manager on W indfarm 
projects, managing the detailed design packages, checking interfaces and 
ensuring compliance . 
• Contou r Global – he was leading the Development Engineering - working 
on package management and design review s. 
• Econnect – he led Technical engineering workshops, was  responsible for all 
Design content for design and build packages, substations , and windfarms.  
• He has strong working knowledge of Engineering reviews and package 
interface coordination . 
 
General Leadership:  
• Currently leading 220 people in total. 6 direct reports spanning functions 
such as Renewables, Regulated T&D, Non -Regulated Contractors, 
Operations, Business Development, split across UK and Serbia.  
 • Leads by influence – instils trust in his teams to perform and holds them 
accountable for delivering on their responsibilities.  
International / JV 
experience  • Worked on projects internationally across UK, Europe, Middle East, Africa 
and Asia.  
Contractor Management   • Has experience working with Chinese subcontractors and evaluated Korean 
contractors during tender. Worked with PowerGrid in India before.  
Mobility  • Flexible t o relocate and be mobile on delivery and contractors’ office sites  
Additional  • Strong commercial leadership experience – understanding of contractual 
negotiations, supplier management etc.  
• On Greenlink Interconnector projects at WSP, his role as Owner’s Engineer 
spans supervisory responsibilities across engineering as well as P&I 
Assurance / procurement reviews (Siemens Package evaluation) providing a 
full report / review incorporating engineering and commercial / business 
considerations.
